meaningMnemonic: A <radical>horse</radical> goes to his favorite <radical>district</radical> to <kanji>gallop</kanji> around. This district has lots of cool buildings and lights to look at, so this horse loves to gallop around there.
readingMnemonic: Then the horse <kanji>gallop</kanji>s into the road and gets hit by a <reading>ca</reading>r (か). Oh man, there’s blood everywhere. This horse is never going to gallop again. That car totally destroyed it.
